bibl.title: Two New Homeric Papyri from Oxyrhynchus.
bibl.note: 1. HOMER, Iliad I, 90-92; 95-100; 119-125; 128-153. Third century A.D., - 2. HOMER, Iliad V, 197-208; 323-344; 346-367; 373-392; 396-412; 451-459; 835-853. Second-third century A.D. - An abridged version will be reedited in a forthcoming volume of P. Oxy.
bibl.seg: UCCIARDELLO Giuseppe, Two New Homeric Papyri from Oxyrhynchus.
